text: Maddie Evangelous is an American ice hockey forward, currently playing for the Connecticut Whale in the NWHL. == Career == Across 112 games with Elmira, Evangelous put up 108 points. In 2016, she was named to the ECAC West All- Rookie Team. She played lacrosse for the college as well as hockey.https://www.milforddailynews.com/sports/20190224/hudsons-maddie- evangelous-keeps-it-100-at-elmira-ny- collegehttps://athletics.elmira.edu/sports/womens-ice-hockey/roster/maddie- evangelous/4238https://www.bostonglobe.com/sports/2015/03/28/preps-all- scholastics/yRdlKSeot2MLa4ziwjm1oN/story.htmlhttps://www.metrowestdailynews.com/article/20160221/SPORTS/160229412 In 2019, she signed her first professional contract with the Connecticut Whale.https://athletics.elmira.edu/news/2019/10/7/womens-ice-hockey- evangelous-makes-pro-debut-alongside-hughson-with-connecticut-whale.aspx In her first season with the Whale, she scored 1 point in 22 games as the team finished last in the league. == Personal life == Outside of hockey, Evangelous is a nurse.https://womenshockeylife.com/ncaa-d3-maddie-evangelous-elmira- soaring-eagles/ == References == == External links == * Category:Connecticut Whale (NWHL) players Category:Elmira College alumni Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American women's ice hockey forwards
title: Maddie Evangelous
